mapper.select: SELECT * FROM project_list WHERE approve_stat = "request" ORDER BY project_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow} ,#{listLimit}

SELECT project_list.project_title, project_list.representative_picture, project_list.service_type, project_info.category, project_info.sub_category, project_info.adult_check, project_info.target_amount FROM project_list INNER JOIN project_info ON project_list.project_code = project_info.project_code WHERE project_list.project_code = #{projectCode}
